law.catch_line: The register shall assume due execution of the will:...
law.text:
The register shall assume due execution of the will:
If the will appears to have been duly executed and contains a recital by attesting witnesses of facts constituting due execution; or
If it does not so appear, or if the will does not contain that recital, then upon the verified statement of a person with personal knowledge of the circumstances of execution whether or not the person was in fact an attesting witness.
